note: These practice questions are interspersed within the tutorial slides for immediate practice.

questions.questionText: A car travels 150 km in 3 hours. What is its speed in km/h?
A person travels from A to B at 40 km/h and returns from B to A at 60 km/h. What is the average speed?
questions.explanation: For equal distances: Average Speed = (2 × 40 × 60) / (40 + 60) = 4800 / 100 = 48 km/h.

questions.questionText: A train 120m long crosses a pole in 12 seconds. What is its speed in km/h?
A boat travels downstream at 18 km/h and upstream at 12 km/h. What is the speed of the boat in still water?
questions.explanation: Speed in still water = (Downstream + Upstream) / 2 = (18 + 12) / 2 = 30 / 2 = 15 km/h.

questions.questionText: Two people are 100 km apart and travel towards each other at 30 km/h and 20 km/h. When will they meet?
questions.explanation: Meeting time = Total Distance / (S₁ + S₂) = 100 / (30 + 20) = 100 / 50 = 2 hours.
